sstoch(int, Vector, int) - Method in class CCAPI.FinancialLibrary
not implemented - returns slow stochastik trigger and signal in a two-field double array. double[0] is trigger and double[1] is signal.
starc(Vector, int, int, double, double, int) - Method in class CCAPI.FinancialLibrary
returns the starc bands in a double array, val[0] lower starc band, val[3] upper starc band use val[1] + val[2] for the factor1 starc bands. factor1 defines the band for the inner starc bands, factor2 defines the amout for the outer starc bands, good parameter settings are: v/20/14/2/3.
